reviewText: Very cool! And FREE! Beyond this, really well crafted characters. Characters feel larger than life. Material textures show nicely on the Vive. Scene and colors are bright and the environment feels superb. Finely detailed - which shows especially when standing face to face with the characters.\n\nThis is also an excellent introduction to the VR experience. Will definitely share with others! Thanks!
voteText: 7 of 9 people (78%) found this review helpful

reviewText: There is no gameplay: you just see some beautiful game characters life-size near you, with a few animations. Still, it is recommended because of the emotions that the pretty characters can elicit.

reviewText: As a VR character viewer it works perfectly. Very impressed with the details, sale and effects.  If the game is an actual VR game (when it launches) I'll certainly give it a go after seeing this.

reviewText: Very unique character viewer. Has a hand full of abilities and skin colors per character. Standing next to them in scale is magnificent!

reviewText:
Product received for free

This is not a game.
It is rather a showcase of all the characters of the game in all costumes and colors.
But it is amazingly stunning to see your favorite characters standing in front of you in life size performing all your favorite moves.

Nice Treat!

reviewText: Well, the menu shows up and my controllers show up, but there's no way to select a character. There's no pointer or anything. All I can do is wave my arms around and flip my flashlight on and off. Not very fun.
